website_summaries.verdict: Choose the Model E if your prefer the added seat height; otherwise save around $200 and pick the Model D instead.
pros: Features a flywheel and damper design for smooth performance
Its Performance 5 monitor tracks workout data
Has adjustable footrest and 14-inch seat height
cons: It's a pricey piece of equipment, but the exceptional workout it provides makes it worth the cost

customer_reviews.title: Has a couple of drawbacks but overall very good product.
customer_reviews.text: The first problem that i had was getting the software to work with the phone. After some considerable effort i was able to get it working. Software turned out to be ok. Second problem is that the handlebar is too short so my last two fingers would automatically hang off rhe edge. I made a longer bar to fit my normal shoulder width because no alternatives were available. Thirdly, the rollers under the seat can easily be impeded by small particles that get on the rail if you roll over them. "You Must Clean The Rail Every Time Before Using!!!"
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Piece of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: This rower was a breeze to setup, and a very high quality piece of workout equipment. Truly worth the steep price tag. If you want to get the best all body workout then look no further. Just please make sure to use proper rowing form and technique, as it is quite easy to injure yourself if you don't. There is a lot of misinformation out there, so read the manual that comes with the machine on how to best use it. Bottom line: If you're in the market for a rowing machine then buy this one. It is expensive but will last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: The gold standard in rowing machines
customer_reviews.text: I've been rowing on it a couple of times a week for a few months now. Very happy with it. Built well. Very smooth rowing motion. Great cardio exercise with no impact like jogging. I store it in two pieces between uses to save space. It only takes a few seconds to put it together and take it apart. I also use a small pillow on the seat to make it more comfortable. The Concept2 website has a lot of useful videos and tips.
customer_reviews.author: M.Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy and refused return
customer_reviews.text: It's just way too big for a small apartment and you dont feel any retention for awhile while using it. I want to feel that burn like it's working. They wont take it back it's been one week past return time which is ridiculous. I'm a recently divorced woman and the package was super heavy for myself to carry and put together. Plus with work etc.. I didnt have time to get it done immediately. I have to work long hours to support myself.
customer_reviews.author: ErikaChambers

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I hate working out, and I can't run because of a bad hip & weak knees. My elliptical trainer substitutes, but it is so boring. Having rowed at a gym, I decided to purchase one for home, and researched carefully. This one got excellent reviews across the board, and I must agree it is fantastic. Smooth operation; the closest you can get to a full body workout without the tedium & stress of running. I still hate working out, but I hate this less than anything else (lol).
customer_reviews.author: Ana la rubia

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of this thing is incredible. The onboard electronics/software isn't going to win any awards but that's not why you'd buy this thing. I hesitated a long time to purchase it but don't regret it at all. All the moving parts are smooth and proper. It's solid as a rock. I have not used every row machine out there so won't compare but I am very please with this machine. Take note of it's length...it's long! All you have to do is put the legs together and plug in the batteries and you're rowing. Very impressive piece of engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Uber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Arrived early and in perfect condition. No issues putting it together. Just make sure you properly care for the chain to ensure long chain life by oiling it every so often. My body will give out before this machine does, the nice part is it's high reaistance not high impact. It's a great cardio workout.
customer_reviews.author: Dodgerz23

customer_reviews.title: Great product adjustable resistance, very durable professional quality
customer_reviews.text: Concept 2 is about the best there is. I used one for years at a gym. Great for beginners since the resistance is adjustable. This is a great feature since it takes a little while to get used to it. Once your body adjust, you will need to increase the resistance to get you heart rate up. I used it to recover from a major surgery, started out slow and gradually worked my way back - highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Harbert

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well built. But a problem
customer_reviews.text: Solid machine I used for years in CF class. However this one seems to have some glitches while using the fish game and the target game as it becomes non responsive then after a delay the screen tries to “catch up”... disappointing since I am worried if it’s its only a glitch or if the actual rotation sensor Is malfunctioning or not and I am NOT packing this heaving thing back up to concept HQ! If they resolve the issue promptly I will raise stars in review, we’ll see how they respond soon...
customer_reviews.author: Bille

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move, fun to use
customer_reviews.text: It's not very loud. Doesn't even scare the cats and I can watch TV at just slightly higher volume. Super-easy to move around the room. I had originally wanted a NordicTrack rower, but I didn't want something I couldn't move to another floor by myself. I also didn't want something that would take up half my living room. This is perfect. The presets are straight forward and powered by muscle power, so no outlet is needed. High quality, solidly built. I got this, because I was able to test row on a friend's Concept2, which helped me decide. It was easy to put together by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product but....
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the first item because it was making a weird noise. I contacted concept 2 and they told me something in shipping messed it up. I ended up returning it (real pain to return this monster) and buying direct from concept 2 for same price. The second one was perfect and didn't make any weird noises. Workout wise, this thing is a beast! I can't believe I never used this before. Make sure you learn and practice the motion. I cringe now when I see most folks using the machine in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This product has exceeded my expectations. I bought it because at age 52 my hips and back we're in such pain I was not able to run anymore. But I still wanted to stay in shape. Interestingly enough the rowing has eradicated my hip and back pain. And it was pretty immediate - by about my second work out...no more night back and hip pains. My next plan is to alternate running and rowing days. If that doesn't work...that's ok. Rowing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_User_SC

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for indoor exercise!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fitness nut. I exercise every once in a while, but due to bad knees I find most other type of exercise taxing and not fun at all. This rower is different! I can comfortably exercise for long time and I love that this is more an endurance exercise. The rower is awesome, easy to use and the PM5 computer connects easily over Bluetooth to the iPhone app and to my Garmin watch (as HR monitor). The pull is realistic and air-resistant is spot-on! Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Akhil

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a BodyCraft that broke and chose this brand/version based on the reviews. Seat is surprisingly comfortable; footpads don't move; I don't think it is really all that easy to collapse. Pros: Quieter than the BodyCraft and movement is more fluid. Cons: It is big, both in terms of its footprint, and for shorter users. We got a seat pad to provide both cushioning and physical lift.
customer_reviews.author: Kayretired

customer_reviews.title: Move it ONLY if it's in an open location
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful rower. Move it only if it's in an open location because the casters cover too much of the wheel and scrape the floor before it's pivoted into a traveling position. You need enough storage room to stand behind it, and then rotate the wheels before moving it, angling the machine just right to travel. Can't be stored in a closet or a corner! There's just not enough room. The component that holds the seat doesn't have wheels but is light enough to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W. Mcclure

customer_reviews.title: Concept2 Model D is a winner for me
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before selecting a rowing machine. The concept2 Model D works extremely well. Not being an overly active person anymore I decided to start out with 10 minutes on the machine. 10 minutes turned into 15 minutes my first night and by the 3rd night I was averaging a 40 minutes of exercise. The machine takes approximately 15 minutes to assemble. If you are not super handy, add another 10 minutes. The only thing I wish they offered on the machine is a peddle extender. Having larger legs I would appreciate having a wider width pedal structure on which to rest my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Vence

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this machine
customer_reviews.text: We've had this incredible machine for nearly a year now & have been loving it. If you commit to rowing 2-3 times a week & couple it with healthy eating you WILL see results. Increased endurance & energy will come right away, along with gradual improvement in body physique. After you get the machine, head over to the Concept 2 website and sign up for their daily workout email. They will even provide the button sequences to input into the display that will streamline your workout of choice. This rower will give you a full body workout at a fraction of the price of an unused yearly gym membership.
customer_reviews.author: LJinWA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic home work out
customer_reviews.text: Now that we're all socially distanced, it was time to upgrade our home cardio and ditch the gym memberships. My husband and I settled on this rowing machine after quite a bit of research. WORTH THE COST. Super quality, very stable, and easy to assemble. Fits nicely into our garage. Daily workouts are easier now that we have this fitness technology at home. RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna L.

customer_reviews.title: Best workout ever
customer_reviews.text: For a 65 yr old woman, I am in pretty good shape, but my knees hurt, my hips hurt, and I hate the treadmill. Trying to get in 10K steps is time-consuming for me. After trying a friends rower I was hooked. I researched different models, and this is a winner....yes, it is pricey but so easy to put together. Did it myself in less than 1/2 hour. I feel every muscle I used, and my heart rate was right where I wanted it. Great rower.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably ready to assemble. It took me longer to get it or of the box. It comes with the only tool you need to build it. It works and functions great. If you've ever tried a rowing machine in a gym, this is most likely what they have. I've read complaints about the noUse they make, but that's of no concern to me. If I'm working out, I have the tv on or music, so it doesn't bother me. It Woodbridge bother me even if I didn't have them on, it's not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Aubree Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I finally talked myself into springing the big bucks for the Concept 2 and am really glad I did! It was very simple to put together and it is a joy to use! I used one just like it at the gym but wanted one at home because now I live too far from the gym to talk myself into driving there. I can stream tv on the computer and can hear the audio at a very reasonable volume. The only real noise from the rower is from the fan. Save up for a little while and get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cardio equipment on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this piece of equipment. I own a gym and its difficult to get clients to do cardio. Everyone has a love/hate relationship with the rower. You get a great workout on it even if its a 500meter warmup and it. So easy to put together. Doesn't take up a lot of space. Easy to maintain. I will never buy another treadmill, they can go outside:). I even had a client buy one because he himself likes it so much. Best purchase I have ever made for my personal training studio.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Love it, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rower! It arrived in only four days, was packaged well and was extremely easy to assemble. I unpacked it, assembled it, and started rowing within 15 minutes of opening the box. If you are thinking about buying this rower and are having doubts for any reason, let the doubt go and buy it. Great workout on a great piece of equipment. I purchased the rowpro software that was mentioned in one of the reviews, and there was a brochure included in the box with the rower. The software is great and makes my workout more fun. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NikNor

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a nice change of pace from the treadmill
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this for one week, but it does seem well built. It literally took ten minutes to put it together. There are different modes where you can basically just pick up and row, play games, or compete against other people's times. I've never used a rowing machine before so I can't speak for how well it works compared to other machines. The first exercise I did was the 2,000 meter row in 8 minutes and I was winded. Seems like a nice change of pace from the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: JenH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Worth It
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Concept II after checking them out in a nearby gym. They seemed sturdy and quieter than we had expected. Upon arrival, it needed some assembly, but even a complete novice such as myself was able to easily assemble the machine. Since then, we have used it repeatedly. It is exactly as described. The various levels make it ideal for a family so everyone can utilize it. I tore my ACL only 3.5 months ago, and I am still able to use it. I'm glad we purchased the Concept II and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Quality equipment and good value
customer_reviews.text: Some people may think it's expensive, but it's very well built -- and that, coupled with it being very dependable, makes it cheaper than buying an inferior machine and then having to buy another one when it fails. Computer that comes with it works well. You can connect to it with your iPhone and the LiveRowing app to program different workouts too! Pairs with my Apple watch, and the whole workout, including heartrate is tracked.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Seniors (like us) or serious athletes for strength training and stamina. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING rowing machine. It's so quiet, rides (glides) smoothly with precision that allows gradual-self-paced progress for body strength as well as aerobic capacity. My husband has one lung + asthma and he's improving his breathing capacity and gaining stamina. We both go to yoga 3 times a week and this is the perfect addition to our strength and stamina regime for health. We're in our mid 60's and this rowing machine offers adjustments to accommodate our strength and we can increase the difficulty as we progress. We've started with 3 minutes/twice per day and adding time and resistance. We're in love with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Notvested

customer_reviews.title: Best exercise equipment I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: An incredible work out. What I like most about this equipment is that it feels smooth and light as you're exercising, almost to the point where you don't think you're getting enough of a work out. I keep adding more time, pushing myself a little harder. Then you get up and feel it all over your body.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzyboy

customer_reviews.title: Great rower
customer_reviews.text: I love this rower though it is my first one so not much to compare to. Luckily my ceiling is high enough for me to stand it up so it takes up a small space when not in use which is great. Seat is extremely uncomfortable though. I haven't upgraded yet hoping I get used to it but I think Ill need to.
customer_reviews.author: Rhodie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people who love cardio but hate running
customer_reviews.text: The Concept2 rowing machines are the Rolls Royces of the rowing machines. You see them in every high caliber gym. I have yet to have any issues with my rower even after 50 hours on the machine (Yes there is a way to check that stat). I would recommend this rowing machine for anyone who doesn't like to running for cardio and is looking for a machine more forgiving on your joints. It's perfect for the small home gym as it can be stored upright and out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride without rocking around. Very solid machine.
customer_reviews.text: Since I can’t walk due to a foot injury, I decided on a rower to get an all over workout. This machine is the best!!! It was super easy to put together. And my whole family uses it. We adjust the resistance. It’s worth every penny you spend on it. Very smooth motion, no wobbling. It’s very solid. This gives a great all over body workout in a short time. My only complaint is that the seat is so hard. Had to get a special cushion for it in order to ride without butt numbing after 20 min.
customer_reviews.author: Mendy Ouzillou

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: If you know you like using a rowing machine as part of your routine this is the unit you would want to have. Easy to assemble, storable, packaged well for shipping. Very quiet for a air based rower. Smooth motion, solidly built. I was hesitant to pay on the high end of the price range for one of these machines but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say bad about this machine? Shipped fast, assembled in minutes, on my way to a heart attack 90 seconds later. This is the ultimate "no excuse" workout machine, who doesn't have 2 minutes to spare? I do a 500m then walk around wheezing for a few minutes, I'm good to go. I held off for years because they're so expensive, but it is kind of a perfect machine.
customer_reviews.author: Syrah4689

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have been rowing for about a month and I am hooked. I was looking for a machine that help with cardio and strength training. I love being able to track my progress on the Concept website. I have gained strength and flexibility in a short time and look forward to more gains. This machine is great for anyone from someone trying to get back into shape to an Olympic rower. It is most definitely low impact and hopefully injured are few and far between. This machine is built to last.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful machine, quiet and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful machine, quiet and smooth, feels like you are not having a workout until you feel it the next day! It is pricey but in my mind worth it. If you can afford it, and rowing is your thing, then I suspect you won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shanti

customer_reviews.title: Buy it fatty.. otherwise youll just get fatter
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i was suppose to be. Couldnt be happier
customer_reviews.author: Stuff Junky

customer_reviews.title: DONT RUN , ROW !!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellenct low impact cardio that builds all muscle groups. NO Excuses not to use this machine. Can’t rub? Then you can row . Concept is known for is standard of excellence . Uses air flow . Don’t buy rowers that use magnetic ! This rower smooth with unsurpassed fluency with the row . If your interested in a rower the CONCEPT 2 is an excellent buy for the money !
customer_reviews.author: Rafikizuri

customer_reviews.title: Concept 2 is the Industry Gold Standard - What else is there to say??
customer_reviews.text: This review is really not necessary as I am only repeating what everyone else has already said. The Concept 2 is the standard at which all others are compared. It is the same rower my gym (and most others I suspect) has. If it is designed to hold up to heavy daily gym use, it will certainly hold up for home use. In this price range you simply cannot do any better. It was well packaged and arrived safely. Simple to assemble and move around. Make sure to also get the 102" Supermat to protect your floor. I use on a berber and it works just fine. Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: HFJeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made rowing machine-- solid and works well. I especially like that it provides resistance with a fan that doesn't require external power or have to be plugged in. I've had other exercise equipment for which the electronics have failed and not been easily reparable. The mechanical resistance on this machine should make it more durable than that. The only electronics are those battery operated in the small display box that provides data on the workout. I should add that rowing on this machine provides a full body workout-- legs, arms, torso. I find that much better than the elliptical and treadmill I've used before, that provides little upper body exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessean

customer_reviews.title: Superb product. Amazon Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Best product we have ever aquired. This machine is superb quality. No wonder everyone has one. Spend the money.... it is amazing. Love this thing. And it's fun. Did not get paid to say this seriously this thing is awesome. We love it..and you get results without pain. Going for an hour soon. Thanks Amazon. Amazon Rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This is a very high quality rower. It is well designed, easy to move and easy to use. I have been using for a few months now and could not be happier with this purchase. The last rower I used was in the gyms 20 years ago and I am very pleased with how smooth the row while giving a very good workout. I started getting back in shape with a treadmill and was ready to go to the next level and the Concept2 rose to the challenge. I am not always looking forward to getting on it but am always happy that I did when I am finished. Head to toe muscle workout at very low impact.
customer_reviews.author: Skygyver

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have been planning to get this for a while and when there are indications that gyms will be shut down I ordered it. It arrived the day my gym was shut down, perfect timing! The setup was very easy and I was rowing in no time. Would recommend getting the gel cushion if you plan to rower longer than 15 mins. This is well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Best Rower ever!
customer_reviews.text: Received my Concept 2 within a week of ordering online. Arrived at my front door in one undamaged large box. I am a 63 year old female who was missing my workouts that included rowing. I was able to open the box and assemble the rower by myself! I was up and rowing within 30 minutes of opening the box and assembling it. This rower is SO SMOOTH and QUIET. Glides easily. Easy for anyone to set up and jump on and row!!!! It is heavy duty and I'm expecting it to last for a long time. Again, BEST ROWER EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our workout routine
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Awesome machine. So smooth and quiet - and a great workout. Very easy to put together, literally took 5 minutes. Watched a few online videos and found such a nice variety of routines. My 28 year old son has one and recommended it to me and my husband and we love it!!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best home rower
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great, and it is the standard for rowing on solid ground. It was a little hard getting the two main pieces together. I had to sit on it to actually get the latch to secure. Otherwise this machine is great. I needed a home workout solution, and it fits the bill. I use this thing for 20-30 minutes, shower, and even after I shower I'm still feeling the heat from the workout. If you have space for it and need a cardio solution. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Best Indoor Rower on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I was a collegiate rower so I know that Concept 2 rowers are good high end rowers and the best ones on the market. I just bought a personal one from amazon. It was delivered within a week despite its size. It comes mostly assembled you only have to screw the front legs on with provided screws and screw driver. It also comes with beginners guides on rowing technique and how to use the PM5 monitor. I haven't used alot of the special features on the monitor but really like being able to transfer workout data to a computer with a flash drive. If you are looking for a indoor rower Concept 2 can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: ... this rowing machine for over a year but felt like I shouldn't spend the money
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted this rowing machine for over a year but felt like I shouldn't spend the money. My SO bought it for me as a surprise and I love it! It arrived two days earlier than expected and was well packaged. It took less than 10 minutes to put together. It is really smooth! I felt like I was getting a really good workout. I could really feel it in my legs! I'm looking forward to updating my review after using it for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great machine! I have been using this machine 3-5 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine! I have been using this machine 3-5 times per week for the last year and am still impressed with the quality of the workout and the quality of the machine. Maintenance is very simple requiring only that I oil the chain weekly (takes less than a minute). I would recommend this machine for any level of workout. My only complaint is that the machine is somewhat noisy, which makes it difficult to listen to music or TV while using it (an issue with all air resistance exercise machines).
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Good overall piece of training equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Five star piece of equipment. Easy to assemble. Easy to use. Very quiet. And it’s making me look good. Pricey, but a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: AGK

customer_reviews.title: Great rowing machine
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are in our 70s and we put this together in no time. Very easy to assemble and just as easy to stand up for storage when we are done with our workout. I am 6’3” and 250 lbs and my wife is 5’6” and weight appropriate and the rowing machine fits us both perfectly with no adjustment. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T. Dore

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My first concept2's monorail failed after 12 years. Part assembly replaced under warranty. Now refurbishing it. Bought a second one because of the long lead time to fix the failure. The new one & old one are great machines, require little maintenance, very rugged construction overall and the company stands behind there product.
customer_reviews.author: joel

customer_reviews.title: Take it from the Pros
customer_reviews.text: Very well engineered/made. I purchased this after talking it over with the Maintenance engineer at UCI who is responsible for maintaining all the equipment at Students' workout center (which is in CONSTANT use). They have used all types of rowing machines from various manufacturers (money is no object at this facility) and he told me this one required the least maintenance "I never have to fix anything on it" We (family) went with his advice and have not regretted it to date. My wife and son use it as well and they couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: brooke robbins

customer_reviews.title: GREAT rowing machine.
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my crossfit expert nephew - and I am very glad to have bought this one. It costs more than others, but works incredibly well. Easy to store, keeps good records of your workout, and is easily adjustable as your fitness level increases.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great rower!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase!!!! This rower exceeded my expectations. I would definitely recommend this to anyone. Construction is solid and everything works smoothly. Have read in other reviews that the seat was uncomfortable, yet, I find it just right. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Public

customer_reviews.title: Great rowing machine
customer_reviews.text: The packaging protected everything, but without an abundance of foam and cardboard waste. It takes only 8 screws to put together, done in 10 minutes! The seat movement is so smooth, as is the chain movement on the pull. It’s very easy to sssemble and move, and adjusting the resistance is quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Holly L. Blocker

customer_reviews.title: Great durable machine
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set up, simple to break down to put away. The log and all the data returned through the app is pretty cool and easy to track your progress with. Seems extremely durable which I expected as I know this is a popular machine for many public gyms.
customer_reviews.author: Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Received my rower yesterday - it's well built and solid. I've had it less than 24 hours, but expect it to last for years. Not much assembly - just 8 screws -- I was by myself and the whole thing from beginning to end took maybe 45 minutes (only took that long because the last screw took about 10 minutes...making sure that all the threads were aligned). Used it last night and very quiet - no need to turn tv volume up. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this exact model in gyms for years, so happy to have one of my own. If your able to buy this product definitely do it, wonderful!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: JUST ROW
customer_reviews.text: It got here really fast and it works just like others I have used in the past. I have a small apartment and live in a cooler climate which makes working out hard and I hate going to a gym. Provides a good low impact workout while I listen to music or watch news or think. It sets up easy and stores easy and takes up very little space. Throw some of those bowflex "select-a-weights" and a pad into the mix you have the perfect gym that takes up the area of a small couch.
customer_reviews.author: cory dalton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome workout!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Concept2 Model D Indoor Rowing Machine is quiet, smoothe mechanically, and easy to use. I find the rowing machine improves posture, and is a great overall workout. Cons: takes up a lot of space (lengthwise).
customer_reviews.author: Lulu in TX

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rower hoping to stay active here in the Pacific Northwest during our dark, wet winters. I'm a little disappointed that it's not more of a work-out but it is low impact, comfortable, quiet, and easy to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Lake

customer_reviews.title: It is something I really enjoyed when I was younger and wanted to get back ...
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on rowers before purchasing this product. It is something I really enjoyed when I was younger and wanted to get back into for health reasons. I admit I was extremely hesitant because of the price, but I am very glad I purchased this particular rower. I've been using it for a month now with no problems. The materials are very high quality and it was very easy to assemble. I expect to be using this for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Satisfied. Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the purchase. Very good quality. I bought the same device I use in my gym. I know what I was buying.
customer_reviews.author: MQSTL

customer_reviews.title: I think this rower is nicer than the high end model at the gym.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together, comes in 2 pieces so I could carry it down to the basement myself, I am a petite 57 year old woman. Quality product, smooth, quiet, nice foot pedals, the timer/mode display is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Gtarldy

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made. Awesome full body workout for cardio and strength, HIIT and LISS. This is the machine to get for personal fitness. Works best with a heart monitor. I use an Apple Watch and the optional phone holder to track and graph my heart rate.
customer_reviews.author: B Burley

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: This rower came packaged very well. It was super easy to set up and works great. My son told me that his gym at his college campus has the exact same one so it must be super durable to withstand a bunch of college kids using it!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2three

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Workout Machine
customer_reviews.text: As far as I know, this one machine trains about every muscle in your body, or enough--truly is a full body workout. And the nice thing, is just a few minutes every other day has toned me up. Much better than the hassles of going to a gym.
customer_reviews.author: MrTruth

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great row machine for the money. Super easy to assemble and disassemble to move. Get a great work out with the varying levels of resistance. Only thing I don’t love about this is the seat. It isn’t the most comfortable and could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Kels

customer_reviews.title: Tough as nails and smooth as silk
customer_reviews.text: This machine is brawny, solid, yet silky smooth. In short, it's brilliant. Plus, Concept2 offers excellent support and resources and tools to motivate users.
customer_reviews.author: Al G.

customer_reviews.title: Best rowing machine ever!! Don't pay for assembly-takes 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: No other rowing machine compares to this one! It is worth every penny. I put it together in 5 minutes with the tool that comes provided when shipped and if my 10 and 12 year old daughters would have been home when it arrived I would have let them do it. It's that easy!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. My husband loves this machine and my nephews love this machine. Had a nephew come over for a visit and spent the next hour just rowing away. Love the games on the machine. The row motion is very, very smooth and you can crank up the resistance based on how much you put into your row. Happy about my purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Van Matre

customer_reviews.title: ... wish the connection to the computer was more advanced like Bluetooth or ant+ connecting with a usb is well ...
customer_reviews.text: Really wish the connection to the computer was more advanced like Bluetooth or ant+ connecting with a usb is well old times. The rower it self is great.
customer_reviews.author: Radiant Simplicity

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition and quickly
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition and quickly. Easy to assemble. It’s seriously 8 screws. Don’t pay for assembly. It’s the exact same that they use in gyms and CrossFit. It’s actually nicer than the one at my old gym. Running hurts my knees and I find the elliptical boring. Rowing is challenging and a great full body cardio and strength workout. I know it’s a little pricey, but it’s excellent quality. You get what you pay for. It is very very quiet. I live in a small apartment and it folds up nice and I know it won’t bother my neighbors when I work out at 4am before work. Your health is an important investment.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Quality Machine
customer_reviews.text: It was simple to assemble and was delivered within two days. About a year ago I have been battling plantar fasciitis in my left foot and was looking for a workout that I did not have to use my feet to exercise. From the very first time I used this machine I could not believe the work out that I received. I am seriously thinking about throwing my treadmill away.
customer_reviews.author: mt smith

customer_reviews.title: Worthy of all the five star reviews
customer_reviews.text: I saw all the five star reviews and decided to buy one. There is a reason that everyone gives it five stars. It is an excellent workout machine. It will come in handy in the winter when I cannot swim outside. It is very well built. You can easily adjust how hard you want your workout to be. I work out everyday and swim many laps but I had to strain (in a good way) to do twenty minutes the first time I used it. Very easy to put together. Clearly deserves all of these five star ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I finally made up my mind and bought this. Living in Wisconsin AND being a Medical student, I just don’t have time to go to the gym and do workouts. Thanks to this awesome erg rowing machine, I can hit my daily 1,000 calorie goal back again!
customer_reviews.author: John T.H. Ghim

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We really like this machine. Our home gym is now complete with the Concept2. The machine is simple, the glide is sturdy yet smooth and the whole rowing motion is efficient. As a couple in their early 60's who have always worked out we felt that the introduction of consistent rowing would be beneficial without the wear and tear on our joints that running on the treadmill can cause over time. The Concept2 filled the bill perfectly. We've gotten in some excellent work outs. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. Loud fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a very smooth machine. The only negatives are that it has a long footprint of 8-9 feet and that if you’re rowing hard it can be difficult to hear the TV. This can be remedied easily if you use a roku and phone app to listen through Bluetooth headphones while watching the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C M

customer_reviews.title: Concept 2 rower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rowing machine to help rehab my shoulder replacement and to prolong the time before the other shoulder needs surgery. It has exceeded my expectations for that. Easy to use, makes it NOT feel like exercising! It is definitely a whole body workout. I should have purchased one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Conn

customer_reviews.title: Best $ ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Love my new row machine. Wasn't too sure I'd be able to do this. I was determined. My first few days 15 min. after about 2 days I was doing 30 min. a day. I was having issues with my knew and stopped, then I got sick, so will be back at it on Monday. I did notice when flipping through channels that they use this same machine on Biggest Looser.
customer_reviews.author: scrimage

customer_reviews.title: We are so happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with this purchase. Ive used this exact rowing machine at the gym for years. Im not one that does great with reps on other machines. I like my cardio with walking and upper body on the rowing machine. This is a tad expensive for home use but i couldnt imagine using anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Burke

customer_reviews.title: Concept2 Indoor Rower
customer_reviews.text: Incredible! Quiet, easy to move if necessary and just love it! There are different choices to calculate your progress and can't say enough good things about it. Have recommended it to several of my friends and they are seriously going to purchase one too!
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Easy breezy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, and easy breezy to ride. Everything is smooth with no hiccups. The sound level is a bit loud if you're not sure what to expect. Flawless and definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: digitalpixi

customer_reviews.title: Best workout available
customer_reviews.text: Delivers a great workout. Really like the software and ability interface with my phone and store workouts. Bought a heart monitor strap and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Wohlert

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I like it except I have found out that my belly is bigger than I thought and I'm more out of shape than I thought. Hopefully the machine will fix all that in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Row row row your...floor
customer_reviews.text: This this is incredible, I was tempted to buy a cheaper one since this was my intro to this type of machine..:I’m glad I didn’t. It feels durable and high quality, it works great, I connect with my phone and app and watch and all these things are working seamlessly together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Back injury
customer_reviews.text: You are going to hurt your back really reallly bad don’t buy it unless you are an athlete.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Awesome health/fitness investment!
customer_reviews.text: Love our Concept 2!!! It came 3 days early, was well packed, and was easily assembled. It took the 2 of us 10 minutes from start to finish. All hardware included (8 screws and a screwdriver) and directions simple to follow. I’ve used it twice since it arrived yesterday and cannot say enough great things about it. Yes, it was a little expensive but it’s so well made (my husband is 6’3” 260# and he fits fine), we consider it an investment into our health.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My knees are bad and I have researched which equipment would provide cardio
customer_reviews.text: I just got the rower for Christmas. My knees are bad and I have researched which equipment would provide cardio, strength endurance, and low impact on knees. So far I absolutely love this. I never work out and this machine gives me a good sweat a good burn but it is actually enjoyable. I can't believe I never considered a rower before. The concept 2 was easy to put together and easy to understand. If you buy it I envourage you to. Heck out their website for proper use to get the most out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Feels better than what I use at the gym
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. Very smooth motion. The display was easy to operate and use. The only criticism I have is that there should be Build in phone or tablet holder.
customer_reviews.author: Jrod

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, smooth, good cardio workout, like being able to change setting to get proper drag factor for wife and myself. Bluetooth connection could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Corey H

customer_reviews.title: I’m a fan
customer_reviews.text: Bette than I expected. We have one at work that I enjoyed and I’m enjoying even more at home. It’s a blessing to have such a machine available. For Jesus glory! Soli Deo gloria
customer_reviews.author: C. Bess

customer_reviews.title: High quality is worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece of equipment! Easy assembly and just exactly the same model they have at the gym, but mine seems smoother. Whoopie, I can now row at home with my husband while he deals with health serious issues. Save my sanity and keep me on an even keel by caring for the caregiver! Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: catbunting

customer_reviews.title: Great rowing machine
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to try a rower for our standard exercise. We also lift weights, do Tai Chi, some Yoga and ride mountain bikes. This rower works extremely well for both my wife and me. It was easy to assemble and it folds up nicely for storage. It has a smooth operation which makes rowing much easier than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my PT
customer_reviews.text: Recommended brand and model from my physical therapist. Will last a lifetime! Easy to put together, but get a mat for under it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The company's website has instructional videos that are very useful in developing proper form
customer_reviews.text: The machine is exactly what I expected. Very simple assembly. The company's website has instructional videos that are very useful in developing proper form. They also have a series of beginning workouts that reinforce the differences between pace and intensity. Exceptional product.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He used to use a Concept2 at his gym and it was the only brand he wanted for our home. He loves it - I recently started using it and love it too. My husband is 6'5" and I am 5'5" - it fits both of us. This is a great, quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: THE NUMBER ONE ROWER
customer_reviews.text: Absolute best rower on the market hands down. Any gym you go to this the rower they use. Agree it does take up room, but you need to know that going in when looking to purchase. Any site you go to it will be in the top five with the only con being storage. Don't let that be the reason not to buy this rower. You will make a huge mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Wish the seat had cushion, as my butt is sore after about 15 min. But maybe that's the case with any rowers. Since I've bought it, I've been noticing that the same model (or Concept 2 Model E - the one with raised seating), is used at demonstrations for rowing clubs. So I assume it's one of the top models for "professionals".
customer_reviews.author: Hee Kwon Song

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and construction.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. Works exactly as described. Very smooth to operate and very sturdy. Holds its own. Have only had it about a month but so far we are loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Jrs

product_meta.title: Concept2 Model D Indoor Rowing Machine with PM5 Performance Monitor
product_meta.description: The Concept2 Model D rowing machine features an advanced PM5 Performance Monitor, improved ergonomically designed handles, adjustable foot-rests, and a flywheel designed for smooth movement with minimal noise. The Model D has a comfortable 14" (seat) height with an aluminum I-beam monorail and stainless steel track for a consistent back-and-forth slide. When done training, you can quickly break down the rower into two segments for storage or use the included caster wheels for easy transport. The Concept 2 Rower provides one of the more comprehensive, full-body workouts of any fitness machine. Engineered to last a lifetime, it's low impact enough for use in physical rehabilitation centers, and intensive enough to be used by the world's fittest athletes.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Concept2 Indoor Rowing Machine, D Model. A Performance Monitor 5 computer, One Model D User Manual, One Performance Monitor Quick Start Guide, tools and illustrated assembly instructions
Rowing machine dimensions: Assembled: 8 ft x 2 ft (244 cm x 61 cm) With Clearance for Use: 9 ft x 4 ft (274 cm x 122 cm) For Storage: 25 in x 33 in x 54 in (63.5 cm x 83.8 cm x 137.2 cm).

Designed to fit most users: 14-inch seat height, 500lb user capacity, adjustable footrests and ergonomic handle. Users with an inseam of 38 inches (96.5 cm) or more may require an extra-long monorail.
Separates easily into two pieces for storage; caster wheels make it mobile; easy to assemble with only eight screws.
Track your progress with real-time reliable data; the Performance Monitor 5 (included) self-calibrates for comparable results; connect wirelessly to heart rate belts and apps (not included).
